articles.headline: Texans dominate Lions in 26-7 win
articles.description: The Texans close out their final preseason game with a blowout 26-7 win over the Lions.

images.name: Texans dominate Lions in 26-7 win
images.caption: The Texans close out their final preseason game with a blowout 26-7 win over the Lions.

articles.headline: Jason Bean slings one to Coleman Owen for a Colts TD
articles.description: Colts extend their lead as Jason Bean finds Coleman Owen over the middle for a touchdown.

images.name: Jason Bean slings one to Coleman Owen for a Colts TD
images.caption: Colts extend their lead as Jason Bean finds Coleman Owen over the middle for a touchdown.

articles.headline: Ulysses Bentley IV powers into end zone for TD
articles.description: Ulysses Bentley IV scores from short yardage for the Colts touchdown.

images.name: Ulysses Bentley IV powers into end zone for TD
images.caption: Ulysses Bentley IV scores from short yardage for the Colts touchdown.

articles.headline: Browns GM: Keeping 4 quarterbacks 'not much of a decision'
articles.description: Browns general manager Andrew Berry told NFL Network's Chris Rose that keeping four quarterbacks -- Joe Flacco, Kenny Pickett and rookies Dillon Gabriel and Shedeur Sanders -- is "not much of a decision."

images.name: Cleveland Browns Quarterbacks [600x400]
images.caption: The Cleveland Browns quarterbacks -- Kenny Pickett, Joe Flacco, Shedeur Sanders and Dillon Gabriel -- are hungry for reps and opportunities in training camp to establish themselves as the starter.
images.alt: Quarterbacks Kenny Pickett #8 Joe Flacco #15 Shedeur Sanders #12 Dillon Gabriel #5 of the Cleveland Browns warm up before organized team activities at CrossCountry Mortgage Campus on June 12, 2025 in Berea, Ohio.

images.name: Foxworth dismisses tension between Shedeur Sanders and Dillon Gabriel
images.caption: Domonique Foxworth explains why there's likely no real concern about Shedeur Sanders' reaction to Dillon Gabriel's comments.

articles.headline: Robert Porcher to join 'Pride of the Lions' wall of honor
articles.description: Robert Porcher, Detroit's all-time sack leader, will join the brightest stars in Lions history at Ford Field, as the franchise announced he will enter the club's wall of honor display during halftime of the home opener against the Chicago Bears Sept. 14.

articles.headline: Ulysses Bentley IV weaves through the defense for a TD
articles.description: Colts get another score as Ulysses Bentley IV finds the end zone from 12 yards out.

images.name: Ulysses Bentley IV weaves through the defense for a TD
images.caption: Colts get another score as Ulysses Bentley IV finds the end zone from 12 yards out.
